blocks.name: lfgrwlkprop
blocks.content: Two adjacent vertices in a walk are different in a loop-free graph. (Contributed by AV, 28-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm lfgrwlkprop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), wf(c3, cdm(c3), crab(s0, cpw(c4), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wne(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciedg, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  imp(wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), wf(c3, cdm(c3), crab(s0, cpw(c4), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wne(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)))))

  syl(wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), wb(wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cword(cdm(c3))), wf(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(cvtx, c1)), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wif(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), csn(cfv(c2, cv(s1)))), wss(cpr(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))), w3a(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  wlkv(c0, c1, c2)
  iswlk(s1, c1, universe, c0, universe, c2, universe, c3, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c1))
  3impia(wcel(c0, cword(cdm(c3))), wf(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(cvtx, c1)), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wif(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), csn(cfv(c2, cv(s1)))), wss(cpr(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cfv(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))), wi(wf(c3, cdm(c3), crab(s0, cpw(c4), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wne(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))))))

blocks.name: lfgriswlk
blocks.content: Conditions for a pair of functions to be a walk in a loop-free graph. (Contributed by AV, 28-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm lfgriswlk(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

blocks.name: lfgrwlknloop
blocks.content: In a loop-free graph, each walk has no loops! (Contributed by AV, 2-Feb-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm lfgrwlknloop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wbr(c2, cfv(cwlks, c3), c4)), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ciedg, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  impcom(wf(c0, cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wbr(c2, cfv(cwlks, c3), c4), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)))))
  mpcom(wbr(c2, cfv(cwlks, c3), c4), wi(wf(c0, cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))))), w3a(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c4, universe)))
  wlkv(c2, c3, c4)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c4, universe), wi(wbr(c2, cfv(cwlks, c3), c4), wi(wf(c0, cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)))))))
  com23(wcel(c3, universe), wbr(c2, cfv(cwlks, c3), c4), wf(c0, cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)))))
  ex(wcel(c3, universe), wf(c0, cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wi(wbr(c2, cfv(cwlks, c3), c4), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))))))
  syl6bi(wa(wcel(c3, universe), wf(c0, cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))), wbr(c2, cfv(cwlks, c3), c4), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)))), w3a(wcel(c2, cword(cdm(c0))), wf(c4, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c1), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), wa(wne(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), wss(cpr(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cfv(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s1))))))))
  lfgriswlk(s0, s1, c3, universe, c0, c1, c2, c4)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c2, cword(cdm(c0))), wf(c4, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c1), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), wa(wne(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), wss(cpr(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cfv(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cfv(c4, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)))))
